btrplace.solver.choco

Class Slice

  • java.lang.Object
    • btrplace.solver.choco.Slice

  • public class Slice
extends Object
    Model a period where an element is hosted on a node. SliceBuilder may be used to ease the creation of Slices.

    See SliceUtils to extract components of Slices.

    Author:
    Fabien Hermenier
    See Also:
    SliceUtils
